Sass

Using variables

$primary-color: lime;

.sass_variables { background-color: $primary-color; }

Nesting

$secondary-color: red;

.sass_nesting { p { background-color: $primary-color; } }

Nesting & Psuedo-selectors

I am a link a { color: blue; &:hover { color: orange; } }

Partials

This is using an imported partial file

@import '../../styles/_variables.scss' .sass_partial { background-color: $primary-color; color: $blue-light; }

Mixins

This is using a mixin to dynamically flex the container

@mixin flexy($justify-direction) { display: flex; justify-content: $justify-direction; } .sass_mixin { @include flexy(center); }

Functions

This is using a function to dynamically inverts color

@function invert($color, $amount: 100%) { $inverse: change-color($color, $hue: hue($color) + 180); @return mix($inverse, $color, $amount); } .sass_function { background-color: invert($primary-color, 60%); }

Extending

This class extends another

.sass { border: 1px #f00; background-color: yellow; } .sass-extended { @extend .sass; border-width: 5px; border-style: dashed; }
